CustomField.description: Future Recommendation is to leverage a SF Trigger or Flow
CustomField.formula: AND( RecordType.Name = "F-SPP", ISPICKVAL(StageName,"Proposal Draft"), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Coordinators__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(Project_Manager3__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(SPP_Office_Reviewer2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(DOE_Site_Office_Approver2__c)), NOT(ISBLANK(PNSO_Technical_Rep2__c)) )
CustomField.label: F-SPP Submit Approval Checkbox
